feed.title: LibreTranslate Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for LibreTranslate: 1.6.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add a customized LibreTranslate instance to the README.md by @lotigara in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/634
  • Update Dockerfile to add NumPy <2 by @silentoplayz in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/644
  • Fix typo in README.md by @ajoga in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/646
  • cuda dockerfile does not have a "venv/" folder by @justinmdriggers in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/648
  • removed non-functional pip command by @justinmdriggers in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/654
  • Update locales by @pierotofy in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/657
  • Update meta.json for ja by @SA99100 in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/658
  • docs: update README.md by @eltociear in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/663
  • Update README.md by @BoFFire in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/677
  • Basque localization finished and reviewed on Weblate by @urtzai in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/678
  • Update locales by @pierotofy in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/680

New Contributors

  • @lotigara made their first contribution in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/634
  • @silentoplayz made their first contribution in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/644
  • @ajoga made their first contribution in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/646
  • @justinmdriggers made their first contribution in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/648
  • @SA99100 made their first contribution in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/658
  • @eltociear made their first contribution in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/663
  • @urtzai made their first contribution in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/678

Full Changelog: https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/compare/v1.6.0...v1.6.1

entry.title: New release for LibreTranslate: 1.6.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: update app.js.template by @eltociear in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/686
  • Update zh meta.json by @CHminggao in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/690
  • All locales updated (including Basque and Galician) by @urtzai in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/697
  • add: Basque language added to the README UI language list by @urtzai in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/698
  • Reviewed Irish/Gaeilge Translation by @aindriu80 in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/700
  • Add gd locale by @gunchleoc in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/702
  • Fix English language name for uk locale by @gunchleoc in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/701
  • Add support for "auto" when translating files by @ng-ky in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/705

New Contributors

  • @CHminggao made their first contribution in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/690
  • @aindriu80 made their first contribution in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/700
  • @gunchleoc made their first contribution in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/702
  • @ng-ky made their first contribution in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/705

Full Changelog: https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/compare/v1.6.1...v1.6.2

entry.title: New release for LibreTranslate: 1.6.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update README.md by @Koberum in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/708
  • Take down offline instance trans.zillyhuhn.com by @ChillerDragon in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/709
  • Updated mirrors by @vdbhb59 in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/720
  • Reviewed the Dutch language! by @DatIsVinnie in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/722
  • Updates - PR to merge by @vdbhb59 in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/723
  • Upgrade Lexilang package to the last version by @urtzai in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/725
  • Upgrade torch by @pierotofy in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/726
  • Fixes the lexilang package for language detection

New Contributors

  • @Koberum made their first contribution in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/708
  • @vdbhb59 made their first contribution in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/720
  • @DatIsVinnie made their first contribution in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/722

Full Changelog: https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/compare/v1.6.2...v1.6.3

entry.title: New release for LibreTranslate: 1.6.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Change the default for ARGOS_DEVICE_TYPE to auto by @Enteee in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/728
  • Changes for docker by @f-lombardo in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/732
  • Update Dockerfile Python base image to mitigate some security issues by @PeterDaveHello in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/738
  • üåè i18n: Improve Traditional Chinese translation by @PeterDaveHello in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/742
  • Removes duplicated aria-label by @urzparat in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/750
  • Detect emoji translation requests by @pierotofy in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/764
  • Catch cant detect errors in lang detection by @pierotofy in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/765

New Contributors

  • @Enteee made their first contribution in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/728
  • @f-lombardo made their first contribution in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/732
  • @urzparat made their first contribution in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/750

Full Changelog: https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/compare/v1.6.4...v1.6.5

entry.title: New release for LibreTranslate: 1.7.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • add blitzw.in instance by @gigirassy in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/770
  • üåè i18n: Improve Catalan translation by @seicifarre in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/777
  • Support for ISO 639-1 - 15924 codes by @pierotofy in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/780
  • Update Dockerfile #737 by @jpralves in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/785
  • Update Requirements: argos-translate-files srt support by @theUnrealSamurai in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/786
  • Add fingerprinting mechanism by @pierotofy in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/787
  • Attack mode support by @pierotofy in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/788
  • Mark Chinese as reviewed in the README's UI Languages list by @LTSlw in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/789
  • Add 2 variations of Dockerfile by @warren-bank in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/790
  • Added full Spanish translation (README.es.md) and link in main README by @KerySeverino in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/793
  • Added full spanish translation (TRADEMARK.es.md) and small bug fixes. by @KerySeverino in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/795
  • Added full spanish translation (CONTRIBUTING.es.md) and Synced latests. by @KerySeverino in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/799
  • Synced latests. by @KerySeverino in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/802
  • Add Kazakh locale to libretranslate/locales/kk/ by @AnmiTaliDev in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/805
  • Support LT_PORT in healtcheck script by @DL6ER in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/810
  • Add new option --frontend-language by @DL6ER in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/811
  • Add --hide-api to hide the API request/response fields from the web interface by @DL6ER in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/812
  • Add user-customizable by @DL6ER in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/814</li> <li>Hide API-related extra buttons if --hide-api is specified by @DL6ER in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/813</li> <li>healthcheck.py: Fail on non 200 status by @736-c41-2c1-e464fc974 in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/822</li> <li>Improve swagger definitions by @pierotofy in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/823</li> <li>Link to docs, move readme information by @pierotofy in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/825</li> </ul> <h2>New Contributors</h2> <ul> <li>@gigirassy made their first contribution in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/770</li> <li>@seicifarre made their first contribution in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/777</li> <li>@jpralves made their first contribution in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/785</li> <li>@theUnrealSamurai made their first contribution in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/786</li> <li>@LTSlw made their first contribution in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/789</li> <li>@warren-bank made their first contribution in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/790</li> <li>@KerySeverino made their first contribution in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/793</li> <li>@AnmiTaliDev made their first contribution in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/805</li> <li>@DL6ER made their first contribution in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/810</li> <li>@736-c41-2c1-e464fc974 made their first contribution in https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/pull/822</li> </ul> <p><strong>Full Changelog</strong>: https://github.com/LibreTranslate/LibreTranslate/compare/v1.6.5...v1.7.2</p>
